resources.string: This game is a blackjack variant that provides the player with power-ups to balance against the implicit edge of the dealer. A list and explanation of each power-up can be found in the "How to Play" section. I hope you have fun playing the game!

All images in this app are used either with explicit permission or a Creative Commons license.
